offenses.message: Use empty lines between method definitions. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#empty-lines-between-methods)
Prefer single-quoted strings when you don't need string interpolation or special symbols. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#consistent-string-literals)

Separate every 3 digits in the integer portion of a number with underscores(_). (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#underscores-in-numerics)

Surrounding space missing in default value assignment. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#spaces-around-equals)
Favor modifier `if` usage when having a single-line body. Another good alternative is the usage of control flow `&&`/`||`. (https://github.com/bbatsov/ruby-style-guide#if-as-a-modifier)
